name: moomoo-milk
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Restores 100 HP.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A bottle of highly nutritious milk. When consumed, it restores up to 100 HP to an injured Pokémon.

flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A bottle of highly nutritious milk. When consumed, it restores up to 100 HP to an injured Pokémon.
